TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but then you wouldn\'t be able to pay for food. Or clothes.

I wish that no-one notices my little subject change.

Granted, but then they don\'t notice you either

I wish that I was famous

Granted, but then they don\'t notice you either

I wish that I was famous

Granted, but your famous for all the wrong resons, and hung for it.

I wish that I was made out of rubber. (dont ask me why)
Granted, but later when you are skiing, your friend playfully pushes you, landing you on the cold, hard ice where you shatter, and subsequently die.

Granted. You divide your brain by zero and become a void.

I wish people would remember to make a wish.

Granted. You divide your brain by zero and become a void.

I wish people would remember to make a wish.

Granted, but they wish for your death

I wish that I was a DRAGON

Granted, but you must visit a city everyday in order to live, and it just so happens that the city is populated entirely by knights.

I wish ice cream could never melt.

Granted Molten Stone flavored ice cream

to have a MLP plushie

Granted but it explodes in your hand

I wish for cookies

You got 1000000000000000000000000000000000000 HTTP cookies, what cause a internet blackout over the world.

I wish that I get a free space trip.

Granted, but everyone else teams up against you and you die a very slow and tortuous death.

I wish the next person would turn into a fish.

You got 1000000000000000000000000000000000000 HTTP cookies, what cause a internet blackout over the world.

I wish that I get a free space trip.

Granted. You are thrown out of the ISS without a space suit. Enjoy.

I wish the next person would be boiled alive.

Granted, but Im made of rubber so it dosent affect me.

I wish the next person was hit by a train whilst typing.

I like trains ;D... you too!

I whish my whish to not be corrupted

granted, but health and safety stop me at the last second.

i wish for series 3 of mlp right now

Granted, but it sucks.

Worse than G3.5.

I wish for a completed, non-buggy copy of KSP.

They just stop developing at this point and simply patch everything.

I wish I did more revision.

Granted, but you fail anyway.

I wish for world peace

Granted, but here is a list of the problems you must solve in order to achieve it :

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10604.0

I wish this was more interesting.

Granted, but then this person would be interested;

I\'m sure you don\'t want to mingle with her...

I wish that the Great Fairies from TLoZ games weren\'t so... Creepy.

Granted, now there are no Great Fairies in Hyrule, but you still need their blessings to continue.

I wish you would stop talking about the Great Fairies.

Granted, but I won\'t.

I wish for the Great Fairy to attack Altair.

Granted, but it\'s only attack is to bless me with a bigger wallet (already filled to the brim with rupees).

I wish I could FALCON PUNCH Nooblet.

Granted, but Falcon accidentally hits a Smash ball and this happens;

I wish that F-Zero got confirmed for the Wii U.

Granted, but it is an 8-bit game. Enjoy pixelated uselessness!

I wish Nooblet would stop eating Kerbin.

Granted, but he eats Earth instead.

I wish gold would magically appear every day in my backyard for me to sell.
